antipasti.name: Caprese
antipasti.description: Fresh vine ripened tomato slices with mozzarella cheese and basil leaves, doused with balsamic vinegar & olive oil

antipasti.name: Burschetta
antipasti.description: Grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with olive oil and salt. Includes toppings of tomato

antipasti.name: Caesar Salad
antipasti.description: Crispy grean leaves, panchetta & croutons tossed in our homemade dressing topped with fresh parmesan. roasted.

antipasti.name: Calamari Fresca
antipasti.description: Fresh pan-fried calamari,fresh garlic lightly tossed in herbs.
